notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The work was supported by the major task of the Ministry of Science and Technology for the creation of new drugs of the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China, the discovery of innovative drugs and the development of new varieties for the prevention and treatment of drug-resistant bacteria by traditional Chinese medicine and natural products (2019ZX09721001-008); the Fundamental Research Funds for the Central Universities (No.YJ201880), the Open Research Fund of Chengdu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine Key Laboratory of Systematic Research of Distinctive Chinese Medicine Resources in Southwest China, and the Key Project of Science and Technology Department of Sichuan Province (No. 20ZDYF3092).
